value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
value.excerpt: Want to explore locations with data? The Visio visual in Power BI helps you do just that! Patrick looks at how to set it up and help use your data to highlight areas within a Visio diagram. value.title: How do I get my Excel users to use Power BI???

Patrick looks at how Excel users can take advantage of Power BI and may just start using that! value.title: How the Power BI Data Region is selected
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how the Power BI data region is selected. This is the what you see when you go to About Power BI and see "Your data is stored in". You should take care to make sure this is where the majority of users you are before anyone signs up for Office 365, Power BI or other Microsoft
